programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. programme.desc: A dating program designed for singles or divorced people who have passed the age of marriage. 4 male guests and 3 female guests would join the one-to-one communication in sequence per episode. programme.title: Time Concert Ep3
programme.desc: Alan Tam, Terry Lin, Phoenix Legend, Valen Hsu, Jason Zhang, and Yisa Yu were invited to serve as "Time Musicians". They sang classic golden tunes and recounted the stories behind the music with the audience. It was full of healing, and resonates strongly with the audience.

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 2 Ep12

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep761762
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) (Repeat) Ep72
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep763764
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44734474
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1750
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3342
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep23
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep3132
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep416
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep34
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) (Repeat) Ep72
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1024
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep744
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Taiwan National Day 2022 (M)
programme.desc: This year’s National Day parade will break from precedent, and for the first time feature foreign performers. It’ll be a marching band from Japan’s Kyoto Tachibana Senior High School, which will be traveling to Taiwan specially for the celebration.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep745
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Piggy's Counter-Attack (M) Ep4041
programme.desc: A rich father, who built his fortune from nothing, goes bankrupt overnight when his investments fail. His children are knocked out of heaven and have to launch a counterattack.

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: During the early years of the Republic era, in the North-East region of China, the people are suffering from the power struggle among the local Warlords, bandits, and Japanese invaders. Warlord Lam (Sammo Hung), is not a leader of great vision, but stands firm in his own beliefs. The only paradise within the region is 'Lucky Town', the one place where no one dared to attack as it was protected by the seven kung fu masters who have resided there. When young patriots, Yan Fang (Rose Chan) who disguised herself as a man, and Howard Luo (Dennis To), infiltrate Tiger's Den at night trying to steal the code book fail in their mission and tries to run, only Yan survives and is rescued by Cheryl. Mistaking Yan as a man, Cheryl falls for Yan. She then brings Yan to Lucky Town and begs the Seven Masters to cure Yan. Cheryl and the Seven Masters are then told of the secret plan by the Japanese, and together, they resolve to fight against Tiger Den and save Warlord Lam.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit…

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Scientist Xia Tian's hard work finally pays off when she successfully sends living tissue back through time by 110 minutes. When her son dies at the hands of kidnappers, she sends herself back through time on a frantic mission to prevent his death.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: Bomb specialist Cheung Choi San sets out to capture a wanted criminal called Blast. However, will he be able to do it in time before Blast kills hundreds of citizens inside Hong Kong’s busiest Cross Harbour Tunnel and destroys everything in his quest for revenge?

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb…

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack…

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a “movie time machine” and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn – can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents’ money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a “Mr McDreamy Training Academy” using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into “Mr McDreamies” with hilarious results.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugo’s enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugo’s enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are constantly fighting with each other on everything, and now they are competing to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the Super Star midwife Gong San to “supervise” their sons and nephews to make it happen…

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jack, a renowned archaeology professor, and his team are on a quest to locate a lost ancient Indian treasure. They find a diamond key unlocking the treasure, but it is snatched by a team of mercenaries. Jack leads his team to India and Dubai to beat the mercenaries to the treasure.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fiancé left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to trap Wong’s disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong thus to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons Of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kung’s brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Clan Of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A noble martial arts student, whose master and peers are murdered by a bloodthirsty karate expert, embarks on a tough training regime so as to avenge them.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical production showcases personable singer/actor George Lam, who tries to find love and success in the world of TV commercials along with his buddies Hamburger and Snoopy.

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey (Yueh Hua) and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan (Pat Ting Hung), Madam White Bone (Cheng Pei Pei) and her sexy sister (Lily Ho), and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it…

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays Kwei Wu, who stumbles onto a kidnapping with his wife Kan Lien-chu (Chin Ping) at the Red Lotus Temple. Kan sends Kwei to go for reinforcements while she stays to fight the kidnappers, but she is captured and imprisoned in an iron cage. As Kwei returns with reinforcements, he must also race to the temple to save his wife.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancée Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Return Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studio’s highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master’s Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan’s daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan’s friend along the way.

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: It's Meng Yuan-wen (star of The Master Strikes) versus Kuan Feng in this wild and wacky wushu saga of a priceless pole with a spectacular secret. A master martial artist's silly disciple struggles to save it from an evil white slaver, the slaver's duplicitous wife, and even his own bone-headed, but greedy, companion. Hsu Hsia choreographs the abundant action, as he had for both Five Superfighters and Drunken Master. The result is both sublime (for its kung-fu) and engagingly ridiculous.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chan’s family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chan’s daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Demon Of The Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fête. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant’s confusion, threatening the couple’s union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: When Kishaloy shifts to Kolkata and looks for a place to live, he is rejected by most landlords as he is a bachelor. When he finally manages to find a home, he lies about his marital status.

programme.title: Balle Vellayatheva
programme.desc: Sakthi moves to a new village after his mother, who is a postmaster, gets transferred. He befriends a childless couple and falls in love with Thanikodi, a butcher's daughter.

programme.title: Maapla Singam
programme.desc: Mapla Singam is a rural comedy about two families in a village that are in constant conflict with each other.

programme.title: Oh My Kadavule
programme.desc: Two childhood friends, Anu and Arjun, decide to get married. However, their marital life becomes complicated due to misunderstandings and miscommunications.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

programme.title: Nagesh Thiraiarangam
programme.desc: Nagesh tries to make his ends meet by working as a real estate broker. He tries to sell his ancestral property for his sister's wedding but soon paranormal occurrences become a part of his life.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Ka Pae Ranasingam
programme.desc: Ariyanachi, a poor woman, strives to bring her deceased husband's body back to India from Dubai, battling the odds of political agenda, corruption and a treacherous bureaucracy that stand in her way.

programme.title: Marakatha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Maniyar Kudumbam
programme.desc: Kutti Maniyar, who belongs to a wealthy family, avoids working and lives off his inherited money and property. However, he decides to turn over a new leaf when he falls in love.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Sindhubadh
programme.desc: Thiru, a crook, falls in love with Venba and marries her before she goes to Malaysia. However, everything turns upside down when her father sells her for the skin trade.

programme.title: Lock Up
programme.desc: Ilavarasi, a police inspector, sets out to investigate the murder of a fellow colleague. However, the evidence appears to be fabricated and suggests involvement of someone from her own department.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a skull is found in a package, ACP Sathyajith gets tasked with identifying the victim and finding the killer. Parallelly, a journalist, who gets haunted by a spirit, investigates the mystery.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: The home minister requests Ravi to impersonate the deceased ACP Baldev, his lookalike, to catch Ganguly, a dreaded gangster. After taking over his new role, Ravi finds many startling revelations.

programme.title: Thondan
programme.desc: Narayanan, a politician's son, assaults Vishnu when his brother dies in his ambulance. Later, he makes Vishnu's life miserable by bribing the local police officers and government officials.

programme.title: Adhe Kangal
programme.desc: Varun Murali, a blind chef and owner of a restaurant, falls in love with his customer Deepa. However, his life takes an unusual turn after he realises the truth about her.

programme.title: Nota
programme.desc: A bachelor who is unaware of the political world is appointed a Chief Minister when his corrupt father retires.
Dr.Vaseegaran is forced to reassemble Chitti in order to stop a deadly winged monster.

programme.title: Kallan
programme.desc: Velu, a man who belongs to a family of hunters, comes up with an illegal way to make good money when the government puts a ban on hunting as a profession.

programme.title: Thiraiflix
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Arjun
programme.desc: Two neighbours and childhood friends who share a love-hate relationship with each other find themselves in a loveless marriage.

programme.title: Meyadha Maan
programme.desc: A youngster who loves a girl tries to commit suicide and to dissuade him, his friend reaches out to the girl, setting in motion events that unexpectedly turn out to be life changing.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep3
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Domingo1

programme.title: Thirst
programme.desc: On a hilltop in Bulgaria plagued by drought, a couple and their teenage son eke out a living doing laundry for local hotels. The arrival of a well-digger and his daughter promises not only to quench their thirst for water, but for something far stronger.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep171
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.desc: Sue Perkins enjoys a night out with Kyoto's geishas, goes free diving with some ama divers and visits Hiroshima. In Tokyo, she explores how the Japanese are tackling the future.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep1
programme.desc: On icebreaker ship Polarstern, the team battle cracking ice, hungry polar bears, violent storms and 24-hour darkness, as they struggle to establish their research base deep inside the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep11
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into the mega-industrial production lines of food factories. This episode looks at peanut buttercups and pasta sauce.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep12
programme.desc: In this episode we see how a leading chocolatier produces up to 500,000 bars daily. Plus, how cashews are used in the Indian treat known as kaju katli, and a peek at the production of pecan cookies.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Discover how engineers built Zaha Hadid's Antwerp Port House, find out how 432 Park Avenue New York was built and marvel at Kengo Kuma's Victoria & Albert Museum in Dundee, Scotland.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Weather - Weather controls the distribution of freshwater around our planet. In turn, shapes the lives of animals across the globe, rising to an incredible diversity of species and habitats.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep1
programme.desc: On icebreaker ship Polarstern, the team battle cracking ice, hungry polar bears, violent storms and 24-hour darkness, as they struggle to establish their research base deep inside the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S1 Ep1
programme.desc: From the humble soy bean to carbon fibre, this episode explores how McLaren supercars are made, as well as Faber-Castell pencils, STIHL chainsaws and Shoda Shoyu soy sauce.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep13
programme.desc: See how the decadent flavour of ice cream is made with chocolate pudding and cookies. Plus, how champagne and strawberry lollipops are made, and how truffle pigs are filled with peanut butter.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Revealing the mouthwatering secrets behind tasty treats. This episode looks at how healthy muffins and red-hot candies are made.

programme.title: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing Our Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Fix Our Climate - Prince William, Sir David Attenborough and Christiana Figueres, the inspirational diplomat who led negotiations for the Paris Agreement on climate change, highlight inspiring and often unexpected solutions to the climate challenge. Looking at ideas like creating diamonds from the air and protecting the great whales, the programme examines the causes of our changing climate.

programme.title: Turkey with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Taurus Mountains to Istanbul - In the Taurus Mountains, Simon stays with descendants of the original Turks, nomads known as Yoruks, whose lifestyle is under threat from the modern world and an increasingly Islamic government.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep1
programme.desc: In Louisiana, Hurricane Ida destroys homes and lives. In Norway, High seas and high winds force a Captain to abandon ship. And in California, wildfires tear through the state.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Cape Cod and Niagara - Extreme Atlantic Coast - Robson travels up the Eastern seaboard from Boston to Niagara and finds blue fin tuna, lobster, striped bass, blue fish, steelhead and spiny dogfish.

programme.title: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing Our Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Fix Our Climate - Prince William, Sir David Attenborough and Christiana Figueres, the inspirational diplomat who led negotiations for the Paris Agreement on climate change, highlight inspiring and often unexpected solutions to the climate challenge. Looking at ideas like creating diamonds from the air and protecting the great whales, the programme examines the causes of our changing climate.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep13
programme.desc: See how the decadent flavour of ice cream is made with chocolate pudding and cookies. Plus, how champagne and strawberry lollipops are made, and how truffle pigs are filled with peanut butter.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Revealing the mouthwatering secrets behind tasty treats. This episode looks at how healthy muffins and red-hot candies are made.

programme.title: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing Our Planet S1 Ep2

programme.title: Extreme Treks S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Switzerland via Alpina: Part 1 - Join Ryan and his team as they explore the city of Zurich, and then set out from Vaduz in Liechtenstein to embark on this mammoth trek towards Montreux on the shores of Lake Geneva, in this double episode of Extreme Treks.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep1
programme.desc: On icebreaker ship Polarstern, the team battle cracking ice, hungry polar bears, violent storms and 24-hour darkness, as they struggle to establish their research base deep inside the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Blue Planet II S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Coral Reefs - Corals build themselves homes of limestone in the seas of the tropics. They are complex structures where there is fierce rivalry for space, but the reef is also a place full of opportunity.

Looking at ideas like creating diamonds from the air and protecting the great whales, the programme examines the causes of our changing climate.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Frozen Planet returns with a spellbinding journey through magical icy lands. Worlds of surprising variety and beauty - seemingly untouched by human presence, it's this isolation that makes these places so special.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Trans-Siberian Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Mongolia, Joanna spends time with native nomads and visits a gold mine. She also heads to the nation's capital, Ulan Bator, to meet the famous Mongolian throat-singers.

programme.desc: Sue Perkins enjoys a night out with Kyoto's geishas, goes free diving with some ama divers and visits Hiroshima. In Tokyo, she explores how the Japanese are tackling the future.

programme.desc: Siberia - Maverick scientist Nikita was a former maths student living in the city, when hhis father asked for help with an extraordinary experiment in one of the most remote places on the planet.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Haven of Giants Ep1
programme.desc: Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Wine’s New Friend Ep5
programme.desc: Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Africa's Edens Ep4
programme.desc: Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 9 Ep9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Fantastic Frogs Ep2
programme.desc: Their ancestors were the first vertebrates to colonise dry land and they inhabit every continent except Antarctica, but their world is rapidly changing. Twenty species call this city home but what was once wetlands are now playgrounds, golf courses and race tracks. This is the land to which they cling. Around the world frog populations are in decline and time is running out.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Haven of Giants Ep1
programme.desc: Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Neuschwanstein Ep5
programme.desc: Learn how one of the world's most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures. From the Alpine ibex to the majestic swans, this castle has been a natural haven for centuries.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 10 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the center’s aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote that’s too people-friendly.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Haven of Giants Ep1
programme.desc: Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Wine’s New Friend Ep5
programme.desc: Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Africa's Edens Ep4
programme.desc: Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 11 Ep11
programme.desc: Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who can’t walk, and see how the medical team ensures he’ll be ready for the wild again.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 12 Ep12
programme.desc: Check in with the centre’s resident turkey vulture, who’s ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Little Penguin Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Emu Ep2
programme.desc: The Emu is Australia’s biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Mission Black Rhino Ep1
programme.desc: It’s a critical time for two black rhinos in Zambia. Four year old female Apson and fourteen year old bull Kango are at the core of a complex relocation mission that’s part of a grand plan to save a species.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Carnivore Rescue Ep2
programme.desc: Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africa’s apex predators.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Bald is Beautiful Ep6
programme.desc: After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves he’s much more than just a class clown.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - The Road to Recovery Ep7
programme.desc: Beni and Lala get an unexpected visit from Vet Arga, Kesi makes a new friend on Bangamat Island, and Alejandra deals with a new view of the world after the accident at forest school leaves her blind in one eye.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Outbreak! Ep8
programme.desc: The race is on to find Tulia and Zalipa, who are missing from Palas Island. And after months of convalescence, Beni returns to forest school but faces another setback at the milk bucket. Meanwhile, the vets keep a close eye on pregnant Dilla.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Dilla and Delilah Ep9
programme.desc: The fate of several graduates awaits the next round of wild releases. Meanwhile, runaway Zalipa is found, but her partner in crime, Tulia, is still missing. And Baby Clarita has a complete meltdown as the vets perform surgery on her mother.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Born to Be Wild Ep10
programme.desc: Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the world’s only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 11 Ep11

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Born to Be Wild Ep10
programme.desc: Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the world’s only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Apex Predators Ep1
programme.desc: Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Birds of Prey Ep2
programme.desc: Birds of prey are amazing hunters. Their adaptations allow them to catch a wide range of prey in a variety of environments. This is a look at some of the most fearsome North American birds of prey.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Aerial Hunters Ep3
programme.desc: Australia’s birds of prey are some of the region's fiercest predators. These highly specialised killers are powerful, resourceful and striking; they use some impressive weapons to survive. This is the story of Australia’s aerial hunters.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Feathering Nest Ep4
programme.desc: Successful breeding is critical to the survival of any bird species, and in this episode we meet four species of birds which go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young, giving the next generation the best chance of life. Wherever they live, these birds have got their work cut out, holding their territory against invaders, attracting and winning partners and safeguarding their chicks.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season’s fury.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - The Valley of the Birds Ep5
programme.desc: Zambia’s Luangwa Valley is home to Africa’s biggest and most fearsome giants, but what really makes it special are its birds. There are over 400 different species here; each perfectly adapted to exploit every opportunity on offer.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - African Myths Ep6
programme.desc: Africa is a continent filled with unique and extraordinary creatures whose lives are shaped by millions of years of evolution. Africa is also the birthplace of humankind. We traveled alongside the continent's animals on our own journey of evolution, yet intelligence took us on a very different path. Our curiosity led to questions about the world around us which were answered through stories, myths and legends.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Chilema and Her Brother Ep7
programme.desc: Chilema is an Elephant with half a trunk; losing the tip to a poacher's snare. It was intended to catch antelope for bushmeat. But the snare's indiscriminate nature means other animals often fall foul of them, with devastating results. Chilema is now having to adapt to life without an elephants most important appendage. She must learn how to eat, drink and also take a mud bath to ensure her survival. With the added challenge of the harsh dry season, Chilema is fighting against the odds to survive.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Tree Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Trees are Africa’s oldest residents, and each has its own strategy for surviving the dry season. The sausage tree and the fig tree ride-out seasonal extremes, to provide food and shelter for struggling animals in the lean times. In return animals help these trees to reproduce by pollinating their flowers and dispersing their seed. African trees promote life, and form the backbone of one of Earths’ most precious ecosystems.

programme.desc: Stranger Than Fiction - A horrific crime scene on a lakefront triggers an investigation into an author and his unplanned confession.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Honor Thy Mother - Ed Gein's grief at the loss of his mother leads to frightening tales of murder. A random twist of fate raises questions about the death of a thrill-seeking teenager.

programme.title: Fright Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Astral Vampire Weekend - Jack and the Ghost Brothers review footage of an Alaskan ice monster, a woman who claims to summon UFOs and an eerie vampire entity in a former morgue.

programme.title: The Dead Files S13 Ep9
programme.desc: The Demons Quest - An explosion of demonic activity puts a family on edge in Oakland, Oregon.

programme.title: Paranormal Emergency S1 Ep10
programme.desc: It Wasnt Human - An officer discovers a demon lurking around an abandoned factory and a mysterious entity protects an officer during a shootout.

programme.title: Alaskan Killer Bigfoot S1 Ep2
programme.desc: It Knows Were Here - The team are left unsettled as they discover evidence of Nantinaq’s hunting habits. Keith and Ash visit a historian, who fills them in on the town's bloody past.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep5
programme.desc: Ants Ants Revolution / Clamsquatch - A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep5
programme.desc: Pit - D-Structs traps the Dinotrux in a deep sinkhole pit – but he overlooks tiny Revvit, who comes up with a plan to help his much-bigger friends.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep5
programme.desc: Hang Ten In Tahiti - Wally and Wenda head to Tahiti to help Wizard Wavybeard find his lost Wave Key. Odlulu sees the Wave Key as her chance to become the best surfer in Tahiti and earn a statue of herself on the beach. The Wanderers and Odlulu have a surf-off, and the winner gets the key.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep5
programme.desc: It'S A Wonderful Larp / My Sectional Romance - Audrey’s obsession with fun gets her too wrapped up in the Bloogey Boys’ LARPing game. The Harvey Girls and Bloogey Boys battle over who’s the rightful owner of a cool couch.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Missing Piece / The Scotchman - Archibald goes on a scavenger hunt for a missing puzzle piece. Archibald marches to a creepy house to deliver a package.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep31
programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful Of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep5
programme.desc: Akila Says No - When Brian and Cleo try to get Akila to say “no”, they find themselves face to face with the galaxy’s grossest outlaws, the scavengers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him “he just had to be there,” but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Terrifying Perilous Misfortune Of The T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Staci’s plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress… who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep5
programme.desc: New Sponsor/ Cleopatra - Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show; beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful Of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep5
programme.desc: Akila Says No - When Brian and Cleo try to get Akila to say “no”, they find themselves face to face with the galaxy’s grossest outlaws, the scavengers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him “he just had to be there,” but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Lantern - Rupert, Edward and Bill go camping. Rupert is excited at the idea of playing ‘explorers' but as darkness falls the friends are frightened by strange shadows and noises.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Rupert’S Treasure Hunt - Raggety is getting the wood tidy for the annual visit of the Spring Inspector. If it's not looking its best, Spring won't go ahead and Raggety needs help from Rupert and his friends

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep9
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep10
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip'S Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep62
programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The Hamazing Hamsterman - Dennis gets into a fluffy mess when he runs into Von Screwtop's Hadron Collider with the Professor’s pet hamster, Galahad. To stop Dennis from completely transforming into a hamster, the gang must sneak him into Wilbur’s lab to reverse the physical (and mental) reaction!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Prank Wars - Dennis discovers that Ralf, the janitor, is the legendary Prankmaster General and is told he could become his successor. Walter can’t let this happen and challenges him to a prank battle to win the infamous Prankypedia.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep5
programme.desc: Return Of The Gladiator - A Voltron-Sized Robot Beast attacks Planet Arus. While Voltron defends the innocent inhabitants, Shiro searches for answers about his lost time as a Galra captive.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep5
programme.desc: Stink Of Fear: Chapter Five - When Fearless Leader brainwashes Bullwinkle, Rocky must team up with Director Peachfuzz to stop them from making the stinky pie and taking over the world

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep5
programme.desc: Ants Ants Revolution / Clamsquatch - A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep1
programme.desc: Little Trouble In Big China - It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Pony Tales Collection Ep54
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Summer Outdoor Jubilee - Lucky's competitive side comes out at the Frontier Fillies' Summer Outdoor Jubilee when the PALs meet the BUDs -- a group of talented young rivals.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep53
programme.desc: The Strife Aquatic - After fleeing the kingdom, King Julien and Maurice discover an unwanted visitor; Sage takes Clover to meet his master; Koto makes everyone his slave

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep1
programme.desc: Booving In / Sant Oh - Best friends Tip and Oh drive each other crazy when he moves into the human world with her./Oh stirs up trouble when he tries to act like Santa Claus.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep27
programme.desc: Bootless Cries - After Puss decides everything bad happening in town is his fault and pursues a new career, the Mole King invades San Lorenzo and changes everything

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep27
programme.desc: Enemy Of My Enemy - After Hiccup is shot down on a remote island while searching for Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, he questions Dagur's intentions to rescue him.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.
