programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Rupert Flies To Cheddar Moon - When Ping Pong uses her magic to turn Rupert's pedal car into a spaceship they fly to the moon. There they meet the Man on the Moon who runs a cheese stall.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Rupert And The Giant Egg Race - It's the day of the Nutwood Egg and Spoon race but Raggety has magically turned Ping Pong into a giant egg. How can Ruprt and the friends have their race now?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep11
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Eco Igloo - Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo'S Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep64
programme.desc: Shrinking Pip - The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Give Peas A Chance - Wilbur passes a law to increase the healthy eating in Beanotown, replacing all foods with peas…of the mushy variety! The gang must avoid the people of Beanotown who are rapidly transforming into Zompeas, from the over consumption of the addictive green goo. Dennis uses the only un-mushed peas in town to sabotage Wilbur’s mush making factory and save the day!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Fan - Walter attempts to sabotage The Dinmakers' chance of reaching fame. He will stop at nothing - even wearing a frock, becoming Wanda and pretending to LOVE Dennis in order to break up the band!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floundering Francois / Pups Save the Pop-Up Penguins - Cap’n Turbot and his cousin Francois are whale watching when the Flounder hits a rock and starts to sink! This rescue needs all paws on deck. // Stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay! Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pizza / Pups Save Skye - Alex and Mr. Porter are delivering pizza dough for a big party when the van spins out of control. Pups to the rescue! // Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Pups Save the Woof and Roll Show / Pups Save an Eagle - When a big pop star comes to town, a storm blows the whole town apart, including the stage! Can the PAW Patrol save the day? // While out in the woods, the pups rescue an eagle caught in twine and tied to her own nest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, it’s a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Pups Bark with Dinosaurs - The Paw Patrol is on an excavation dig when they unearth three fossilized eggs. Suddenly the eggs start to hatch, and there are three baby pterodactyls running around Adventure Bay! It's up to the PAW Patrol to catch the dinos!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep706
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups and the Lost Dino Eggs - When a lost world of Dinosaurs is discovered, Mayor Humdinger wants to take Dino Eggs back to Foggy Bottom but along the way a baby Brachiosaurus ends up in Dino sized trouble! The Pups are ready for a Dino Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep707
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Pterodactyl / Dino Rescue: Pups and the Big Rumble - When Maverick the daredevil Pterodactyl takes a tumble and hurts his wing, the pups are there for a sky high Dino Rescue! // A volcano is erupting, threatening the Dino Wilds! It's all paws on deck for a massive Dino Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game / Pups Save a Lucky Collar - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. // The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep708
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Hum-Dino - Mayor Humdinger takes his Kitties to the Dino Wilds for some dino acting lessons, but instead finds himself on top of a runaway Brachiosaurus bound for Adventure Bay! Now it's up to the pups to save the town before the dino stomps all over it!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep709
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Sore Dino / Dino Rescue: Pups Save the Triceratops Tag-Alongs - In the Dino Wilds, Marshall performs some dino dentistry with the help of an ancient geyser and his fellow Dino Pup pals. // Francois and Cap'n Turbot are in Dino wilds for an adventure but a sightseeing expedition quickly turns into a dino ride!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep826
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater - The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Air Pups - When Volcano Island erupts, the pups must take to the sky in their new Air Patroller! Using their new flight suits, can they soar to the rescue of Cap'n Turbot, Francois and a monkey family?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Pups Save Friendship Day - While celebrating Friendship Day, the pups spring into action to prevent Mayor Humdinger from ruining Adventure Bay's reputation as the friendliest town on the map.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubble’s dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! // Raimundo’s dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Pups Save Daring Danny X / Pups in a Fix - Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue. // RoboDog’s wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dragon / Pups Save Three Little Pigs - A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and won’t let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stinky Flower / Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Humdinger drops off a ‘gift’ to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. // Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Pups Save the Polar Bears / A Pup in Sheep's Clothing - Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs. // When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al’s pasture, it’s up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Bus / Pups Save the Songbirds - When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus. // When the famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, it's PAW Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Pups Save Old Trusty / Pups Save a Pony - Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town. // Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle after they help her out of a canyon.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Pups Bark with Dinosaurs - The Paw Patrol is on an excavation dig when they unearth three fossilized eggs. Suddenly the eggs start to hatch, and there are three baby pterodactyls running around Adventure Bay! It's up to the PAW Patrol to catch the dinos!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep706
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups and the Lost Dino Eggs - When a lost world of Dinosaurs is discovered, Mayor Humdinger wants to take Dino Eggs back to Foggy Bottom but along the way a baby Brachiosaurus ends up in Dino sized trouble! The Pups are ready for a Dino Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep707
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Pterodactyl / Dino Rescue: Pups and the Big Rumble - When Maverick the daredevil Pterodactyl takes a tumble and hurts his wing, the pups are there for a sky high Dino Rescue! // A volcano is erupting, threatening the Dino Wilds! It's all paws on deck for a massive Dino Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Pups Save a Robosaurus / Pups Save a Film Festival - When a homemade Robotic Dino named Earl comes to life, the pups need to find him, stop him, and bring him home. // The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep708
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Hum-Dino - Mayor Humdinger takes his Kitties to the Dino Wilds for some dino acting lessons, but instead finds himself on top of a runaway Brachiosaurus bound for Adventure Bay! Now it's up to the pups to save the town before the dino stomps all over it!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep709
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Sore Dino / Dino Rescue: Pups Save the Triceratops Tag-Alongs - In the Dino Wilds, Marshall performs some dino dentistry with the help of an ancient geyser and his fellow Dino Pup pals. // Francois and Cap'n Turbot are in Dino wilds for an adventure but a sightseeing expedition quickly turns into a dino ride!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep826
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater - The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Tracker Joins the Pups! - Ryder and the pups are on their way to the jungle to help Carlos move a massive relic to the museum when he falls into a deep pit. Carlos is saved by a big eared pup named Tracker. For his bravery Tracker is made an honorary member of the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Pups Bear-ly Save Danny / Pups Save the Mayor's Tulips - Daring Danny X is at it again! This time he’s stuck in a tree over a deep canyon and is pursued by hungry bears. // Mayor Humdinger sabotages Mayor Goodway’s perfect petals for the tulip contest. Chase and Rocky to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep317
programme.desc: All Star Pups! / Pups Save Sports Day - It’s monkey mayhem as pups play kickball against Raimondo’s team, until an eagle steals the ball. // The All Star Pups are ready to compete in the summer sports day when Daring Danny X turns the field into an ice rink!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Pups in a Jam / Pups Save a Windsurfing Pig - It’s the annual Jamboree Jamfest, but all of the fruit is carried off by ants! It's up to the pups to lure the ants to safety. // Zuma is on a wacky water rescue after Cornelius the pig goes for a ride on a windsurfing board.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Pups Get Skunked / Pups and a Whale of a Tale - When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately try to tell her she needs a bath! // The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale that’s trapped under the ice.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Parroting Pups / Merpups Save the Turbots - Rocky loses his voice and can’t bark out his puppack tools, but Matea the parrot has no problem doing it for him. // The Magical Mer Moon means the Merpups are back, only this time they’re helping the PAW Patrol on a rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Pups Save the Gliding Turbots / Pups Save a Plane - Francois & Cap'n Turbot become stranded on a remote island,Ryder and the pups fly in to find and rescue the cousins. // It's a double daring mid air rescue as Mayor Goodway's first flying lesson goes sideways,the Pups make sure everyone lands safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Pups Raise the PAW Patroller / Pups Save the Crows - Daring Danny’s at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller. // Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol to retrieve mysteriously missing items.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Pups Save Floating Friends / Pups Save a Satellite - The alien’s spaceship is on the fritz and shooting out anti-gravity rays. Ryder and the pups need to repair the spaceship. // A satellite is out of orbit and falling towards Adventure Bay, the PAW patrol must fix it before it crash lands.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Quest for the Crown - Chase and the team are called to Barkingburg to keep an eye on the crown.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Royally Spooked! / Pups Save Monkey-Dinger - Another Mission PAW to Barkingburg! The Princess thinks she's seen a ghost, and the PAW Patrol needs to get to the bottom of it. // While on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Pups Save the Royal Throne - Sweetie plans Sweetie plans to steal the actual royal throne, so she can rule.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Pups Save a Royal Concert / Mission PAW: Pups Save the Princess' Pals - Luke Stars goes missing before his Royal Concert in Barkingburg and Sweetie attempts to take over the Concert! // Animals are over running Barkingburg Castle while the Princess is away. It's up to Ryder and the Paw Patrol to get them under control!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep826
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile - The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save a Playful Dragon - Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepover / Pups Save the Carnival - Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save the Flying Food / Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepwalking Bear / Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny - The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up. // Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Hairy / Pups Save a Flying Kitty - Pups need to lure a big ape onto the PAW Patroller so they can take him back to the jungle. // Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Pups Party with Bats / Pups Save Sensei Yumi - Bats are drawn from their cave by DJ Rubble's new dance track. // A wind storm threatens unsuspecting Marshall and Sensei Yumi.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Pups Save a Baby Octopus - A baby Octopus gets separated from its mother and sinks the Flounder. Sea Patrol needs to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Kitties / Pups Save Tiny Marshall - The Kit-trastrophe crew get into the poufy shampoo and blow away. // Marshall dreams he gets shrunk.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Pups Chill Out / Pups Save Farmer Alex - Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch. // Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

programme.desc: Mission PAW: Quest for the Crown - Chase and the team are called to Barkingburg to keep an eye on the crown.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep65
programme.desc: Honk Honk - The Teletubbies hear a 'honk honk' in the distance and the Tubby Car approaches. The Tubby Car drives the Teletubbies across Teletubbyland as they sing the Tubby Car song.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep10
programme.desc: Bubble - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bubble' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bubbles - big bubbles, tiny bubbles, shiny bubbles and even bouncing bubbles!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep64
programme.desc: Touch Down, Up and Around - Hack-Po's friend wants to land her airplane near HQ, but Team Tinpo need to build her a runway first.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: It's time to make a film - When JoJo hears the announcement of a new Captain Chloe film on the radio, she's disheartened to learn that it won't be available to watch for some time. Luckily, Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: The Greatest Gift - Monty has no money to buy a gift for his mum. He wonders if a gift has to be large or cost money to be special.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: Round and Round - Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Hospital - Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep29
programme.desc: The Favourite Badge - The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding what their own favourite things are, so they make a film asking some of their friends what is special to them to help narrow it down.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: Harbin Ice City, China - GrimHQ overheats so lands in Harbin Ice City, melting the amazing ice sculptures.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep10
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hailstorm - Can the Go Jetters brand new click-on save the GoJet Academy from a glitched thunderstorm?

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Magic Xylophone - As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: Daddy Putdown - When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Camptosaurus & Call - Arriving 150 million years in the past, Andy tracks down the peculiar camptosaurus and plays hide-and-seek with a fierce allosaurus.

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Best Of - In this episode, rally driver Catie looks back at her favourite land, water and air machines - but which will they be?

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep5
programme.desc: Seaweed's Scrub Rap - In this episode Captain Captain gives the pirates the not-so-exciting job of scrubbing the ship's pots and pans, but thanks to Seaweed's brainwave they turn it into a world of musical fun!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep21
programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep20
programme.desc: The Crazy Golf Badge - It's crazy golf time and the everyone has to make their own courses.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep19
programme.desc: The Art Badge - The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it, while preparing their own pieces for Tino the artistic mouse's Woodland Biennale.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep9
programme.desc: Seattle Space Needle, USA - The team goes where no Go Jetter has gone before, when Glitch tries to launch into space.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Venice, Italy - The Go Jetters get a sinking feeling when Glitch turns the canals of Venice into roads.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep4
programme.desc: Pingy Pongy Pick Up - The Sodor football tournament is held; all the engines except Emily are given important jobs; she is tasked with picking up dirty laundry.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep20
programme.desc: Old Toys - Duck is bored of his toy collection, so he and Sarah search for old toys in the attic.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep19
programme.desc: Basking Shark - Sarah is keen to adopt a sea creature, but doesn't get her first choice...

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: Foggy Zoo - On a cold morning, Nelly and Nora have fun drawing animals on the fogged- up windows.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: But We Always Do It Like This - When Charlie and Lola visit Granny and Grandpa they always build a special sandcastle on the beach. And they always build it together - until now.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: The Thing That Talked Back - Bob and Tony lose Gwen in a canyon that makes their voices echo - how will they find her?

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: The Thing That Leapt High - Bob can't join in with Gwen and Tony's game but discovers he has different talents.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: Shaun - Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep18
programme.desc: The History Badge - The Squirrels get a very interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces from the past!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep17
programme.desc: The Sharing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between everyone equally.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep16
programme.desc: The Philosophy Badge - The Squirrels think about life's big questions, helping Tino the artistic mouse escape a crisis of confidence and gaining their Philosophy badges in the process.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep7
programme.desc: Avenue of the Baobabs, Madagascar - GrimHQ crashes into the Baobab trees. Can the Go Jetters rescue a baby lemur in time?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Machu Picchu, Peru - A giant grimbot bounces down the valley of Machu Picchu. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: The Numtums (S2) Ep23
programme.desc: Flinders' First Sunset - Flinders has never stayed awake long enough to see the sunset, so Nimbin takes on the challenge to paint it for him.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep65
programme.desc: Honk Honk - The Teletubbies hear a 'honk honk' in the distance and the Tubby Car approaches. The Tubby Car drives the Teletubbies across Teletubbyland as they sing the Tubby Car song.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: The Greatest Gift - Monty has no money to buy a gift for his mum. He wonders if a gift has to be large or cost money to be special.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: Round and Round - Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Hospital - Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep29
programme.desc: The Favourite Badge - The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding what their own favourite things are, so they make a film asking some of their friends what is special to them to help narrow it down.

programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Magic Xylophone - As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.desc: Cubs and Robbers / Billy the Bug - A movie promotion stunt goes wrong, unleashing a humongus 'Cubby the Cop' balloon on the city. // Fire Chief McCloud accidently buys a malfunctioning Twirly Hat for her nephew.

programme.desc: Sky Police / Father's Day Parade - Police Chief Wheeler announces the formation of the 700 million dollar Sky Police. // Police captain, Tom Bennett, gets a call that his wife has gone into labor early.

programme.desc: Geizmo's Day Out - When Alvin kidnaps Simon's robot Geizmo, he gets a lesson in parenting a child going through their terrible twos.

programme.desc: Unbored - When Dave takes away Alvin's phone, the boredom Alvin experiences is enough to drive him crazy.

programme.desc: Eek, An Urchin! / Squid's Defense - SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. // After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep201
programme.desc: An Imposter Among Us - Rick Twitler returns with a new plan to control Mika's mind through a spooky VR video game. It's up to Danger Force to exer-cise the Rick Twitler out of Mika before they're all plunged back into the Dark Ages for good.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: Fairly Odder S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Fairies Away! Part 1 - At odds over whether it's best to make wishes for Yourself or others, Viv wishes for her own talk show to help people, and Roy wishes for a 'Roy Day' party. While the kids are caught up in their own worlds, Vicky sets out to capture Cosmo and Wanda.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Chancla Force / Fluff Love - Carl takes Rosa's chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! // Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Director's Rut / Friday Night Fights - Luan turns to Mr. Coconuts for help after she struggles to direct her school's play. // Lisa joins Lynn's football team as the analytics coach to prove that math will always beat out heart.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep110
programme.desc: A Moral Star, Part 2 - When their plan goes awry, the crew must improvise. Meanwhile, Gwyn discovers a dark truth that will forever jeopardize their quest toward salvation.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Inside Russell / The Stinkhole Chronicles - Parker must save Angus from rapidly aging inside Russell's belly. // Parker and Lily go on a quest through Old Stinkhole to rescue Angus.

programme.desc: Pasture Bedtime / Shop Girl - The boys struggle with whether to attend Liam's barn sleepover or Girl Jordan's awesome pool party. // The kids worry that Leni is too weak and try to teach her how to be more aggressive.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Gown and Out / Breaking Dad - When Lola advances to a regional pageant she worries she could lose for the first time. // Dad has Mr. Grouse watch Lily while he goes to a concert but things quickly start to go wrong

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Song of the Soil / Street Smart - When Mom and Dad hurt their backs at harvest time, it's up to Annie and Pony to bring in the crops. // When Pony invests Annie's savings in an obvious scam, Annie decides he's too trusting but her attempts to make him street smart backfire.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Cinema - Annie decides this is the Halloween her and her friends will find the legendary, abandoned movie theater, with an entire snack counter filled with untouched candy. But Pony's fear of scary things threatens to ruin Annie's plans.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep64
programme.desc: Good Neighbors - Squidward's lazy Sunday is constantly interrupted by Spongebob and Patrick's Good Neighbor Club activities.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep65
programme.desc: Selling Out / Funny Pants - Mr. Krabs sells the Krusty Krab to a conglomerate and explores the joys of retirement. // Squidward tricks his neighbor into believing that Spongebob has a laugh-related illness.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep66
programme.desc: Dunces and Dragons - After a freak jousting accident at a Medieval Times restaurant, SpongeBob and Patrick are transported to a medieval version of Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep67
programme.desc: Enemy In-Law / Mermaidman and Barnacleboy VI - The Motion Picture - Mr. Krabs is horrified to learn Plankton is dating his mother! // SpongeBob sets out to make his own Mermaid Man movie using the original actors, fresh from the retirement home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Huge - Self-conscious about his size, Mantis ingests a growth potion that makes him huge. Mantis is initially thrilled with the results, but soon his large size puts the entire village and his friends in grave danger.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Secret Museum of Kung Fu - With Po and the Furious Five at each other's throats, Shifu takes them all on a disastrous road trip.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Appa's Lost Days - In this special episode, we go back in time to the moment Appa was stolen, and find out exactly what happened to him, and where's he's been all this time - and where he is now!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Mask of the Raccoon - When a raccoon shows up and starts stealing from the zoo animals, the penguins jump into action.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Gator Watch / In the Line of Doody - When Roger’s home in the sewer becomes unbearable the Penguins try to find him a new home in the city. Soon citizens of New York city spot Roger all over town. // The Penguins have to protect the City Zoo Commisioner from Frankie the pigeons wrath.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Lost Treasure of the Golden Squirrel - The whole gang heads on a treasure hunt with the Rat King close on their tales trying to get to the treasure before they do.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Diner Ducks / Switcheroo - After wracking up a huge bill at Pumpers, SwaySway and Buhdeuce level up into Diner Ducks to pay off their debt. // Things get awkward when the guys eat a loaf of Switcheroo Bread and swap bodies.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Ice Ice Baby - After getting caught in a snowstorm, Evan accidentally damages the snow ogre meant to protect local villagers and is made to stand trial for his crime.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Dorg's New Mom / Dorg Hates Olives - The gang need an adult escort to see the new Johnny Fist movie, so Yooki possesses Dorg's mom. // Dorg needs the Magicals' help to stomach his mom's icky Olive Surprise recipe. But instead, they accidentally turn the town into olive-loving zombies!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Festa Perrfeita / O Novato Anúbis - Felicity worries that her powers won't measure up at a party for the most powerful and popular citizens in Mythlandia. // An ancient Anubis king tests Miguel to see if he's ready to leave Mythlandia and become the next ruler.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Trouble Dare / Road Pizza - The dudes play the Dicksons in an epic game of Family Double Dare. // Craig gets possessed by an evil pizza demon that wants to destroy the Frycade.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Ollie's Monster Club / Ollie's Shadow - Ollie tracks down a vindictive monster who is vandalizing Portshill and trying to pin it on him. // Ollie's feelings about Turner unleashes a shadow monster that gets its power from negativity.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep105
programme.desc: I, Fanbot / Berry Sick - Desperate not to fail a test, Fanboy decides to switch brains with a robot. // During a summer heat wave, the boys discover the Frosty Freeze machine is on the fritz.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Toast of T.U.F.F. / Share A Lair - Keswick invents an artificial intelligence toaster capable of doing much more than making perfect toast. // T.U.F.F. and D.O.O.M. are forced to share their HQs after destroying each other’s headquarters.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Shrine of the Green Dragon - The Winx' journey to find the Eldora takes them to the Shrine of the Green Dragon. When they help the Dragon Tamer to fight off evil dragons, he reveals to them a vital piece of information that will help them track down Eldora.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Magic Totem - Flora faces off with Icy the Ice Queen to free Helia and escape the Legendarium World. But it doesn't end there - Icy left her frosty mark on Helia's heart. Can the Winx save Helia and Fearwood?

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep119
programme.desc: You Got Served / How to Make Enemies and Bend People to Your Will - While helping Señor Hueso at Run of the Mill Pizza, Leo and Mikey get sidetracked by brotherly competition. // Baron Draxum struggles to move up the ladder in the Foot Clan.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep166
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble / The Way of the Sponge - When SpongeBob and Patrick accidentally destroy Sandy's air supply, they have to help her find more oxygen. // SpongeBob wants to earn his belt from karate master Fuzzy Acorns. Will Sandy be able to help?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Game Show - Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Alvin Management - When Alvin accuses Dave of yelling at him too much a therapist moves in to help Dave control his anger.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Time Capsule - When the school digs up an old high school time capsule, Miss Smith and Dave work together to keep an old secret.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow / Dentist Trip - Parker finds a body hair, and the cloud assumes it's time to become an adult! // During a trip to the dentist, Parker remembers how the S.S. Steadfast got shipwrecked on Mt. Middlemost.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep120
programme.desc: King Cloud vs. Smogzilla / Ranch on the Side - When a malevolent Smog Cloud terrorizes Mt. Middlemost, it's up to Parker to stop it. // Parker becomes obsessed with ranch dressing.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Ponopoly / President Annie - Annie worries her game night will be too boring, until Pony whips out his custom game, Ponopoly Plus. // The apartment building president tries to keep Annie and Pony from riding the elevator, so Annie decides she'll run for president against her.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Annie's Voice / Business as Usual - When Annie loses her voice rehearsing her song for Winter Fest, Pony offers to speak for her so she can get it back in time. // When Annie and Pony lose Dog, Pony has to take his place and fool Mrs. Okaba until Annie can get him back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep193
programme.desc: Sanctuary! / What's Eating Patrick? - When stray snails start appearing around Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob decides to care for them himself. // To defend Bikini Bottom’s honor, Patrick enters a Krabby Patty eating competition.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep194
programme.desc: Patrick! The Game / The Sewers of Bikini Bottom - Patrick invents a new board game, and invites SpongeBob, Sandy and Squidward to play it with him. // After accidentally flushing Mr. Krabs’ safe, SpongeBob and Squidward must go into the sewers to find it.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings Ep324/Ep353/Ep352/Ep349/Ep103/Ep104/Ep105
programme.desc: Lemmings Constellation/Spinning Lemmings/Polar Super Star/My Friend The Penguin/Bat-Grizzy/Moveable Apps/Wild Modeling - The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show Ep5A/Ep217/Ep61/Ep139/Ep295/Ep169/Ep314
programme.desc: Holed Up/Yeti, Set, Go/Smitten with the Kitten/Chew Toy/Tom Thumblestein/Cat Cop/Millenium Mouse - Tom falls into his own trap and gets his head stuck.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep5A/Ep58A/Ep109A/Ep15B/Ep68A/Ep119B/Ep25B
programme.desc: For the Love of Acorns/Bigs Bunny/Lifestyles of the Wealthy and Obnoxious/Manner Maid/A Duck in the Aquarium/When Irish Eyes Are Swinin'/The IMPoster - Squeaks has misplaced his acorns beneath the pitcher's mound of a recently built baseball stadium. Bugs offers his assistance in retrieving them.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep109/Ep139
programme.desc: A Show Of Socks/Let's Roar! - The Brave Bunnies visit the Mountains, where they get to know Lara the LLAMA. Lara offers them some of the socks she has knitted, but they don't fit.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep9/Ep44
programme.desc: The Book-Wizard/Funny Bird - Alice is not good at taking care of her books, much to her librarian mom's dismay. The Queen of Wonderland is careless with books too; in fact, she has destroyed Lewis' Big Book.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep209/Ep244
programme.desc: Personal Space/Knight Rider - Fig wants to play Space Explorers with Hugo and Frank. But Hugo gets frustrated when Fig doesn’t play the right way.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep109/Ep145
programme.desc: Save Bella!/Irresistible Twig - Bella and Petunia take off to the Grasslands to look for Chhiplop seeds. Petunia returns alone and Bella has disappeared!

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep109/Ep143
programme.desc: Small Wonder/Herds Of A Feather - When a scrappy little compy gets underfoot trying to be just like Blitz, Blitz learns that even the smallest member of the team can make a big difference.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep309/Ep344
programme.desc: Natural Artists Of Big Sky Park/Feeling Antsy In Big Sky Park - Rob spills paints that he needs for a project and replaces them with colours produced by nature.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Laura Philipp - Being an Athlete and a Woman - Menstruation is still a taboo topic in sports, but ignoring the menstrual cycle can be dangerous for female athletes. 'There are a huge number of performances we wouldn’t see in the sports world if women did not suppress their bodies,' says Laura Philipp, one of the best triathletes on the planet. She aligns her training program with her cycle and is more successful than ever before.
